game.title: The Lost Planet
game.synopsis: In the future, Earth has become unsustainable for life. Humans have scattered across the galaxy. 'The Lost Planet' is a thrilling journey of survival and exploration as players take on the role of a spaceship captain, navigating uncharted territories, discovering unknown species, and piecing together the history of a lost civilization.
game.beginning: The game starts in the spaceship, as players have just left the crumbling Earth behind. They set their course for a distant, unexplored planet that holds the promise of a new home for humanity.
game.ending: After confronting various challenges and overcoming numerous enemies, players manage to transform the lost planet into a new home for humans all over the galaxy, ensuring the survival of humanity. The game ends as the spaceship captain overlooks the thriving civilization they've helped build, reflecting on their incredible journey.
